name: Albertsons Companies, Inc.
summary: Albertsons Companies, Inc. is one of the largest food and drug retailers in the United States, operating over 2,200 stores under more than 20 banners including Safeway, Vons, and Jewel-Osco. Headquartered in Boise, Idaho and founded in 1939, the company provides groceries, pharmacy services, and digital shopping options nationwide.
